dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT s.shipment_xid, dm.first_name || ' ' || dm.last_name AS document_mgr, sref.shipment_refnum_value AS booking_confirmation FROM shipment s LEFT OUTER JOIN VIEW_SHIPMENT_DOCUMENT_MANAGER dm ON dm.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid INNER JOIN shipment_refnum sref ON sref.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND sref.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'CHARTER VOYAGE' WHERE s.ATTRIBUTE_DATE10 <= SYSDATE + 7 AND (SELECT COUNT(s_ship_unit_gid) FROM s_ship_unit WHERE s_ship_unit_gid IN (SELECT s_ship_unit_gid FROM shipment_stop_d WHERE shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND stop_num=1)) > (SELECT COUNT(s_ship_unit_gid) FROM s_ship_unit_refnum WHERE s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid='SCOULAR/BCO.921-2 REPORT NUMBER' AND s_ship_unit_gid IN (SELECT s_ship_unit_gid FROM shipment_stop_d WHERE shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND stop_num=1))
